text: If you read my blog in an RSS reader, you should visit the actual site today and yesterday to see how the new features work. They don't come through to your reader, though it's conceivable at some point they could. I have the ability to include images, tweets and xrefs (other posts) in posts. They expand in place instead of linking. A pretty nice upgrade to the web. Come see how it works. If you study the web, you'll get a new idea.
